scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs/dist && cd docs && yarn serve

comments.comments: A JSON file does not allow for comments, but it does not restrict adding new nodes, so we can add a comments section to be able to comment on other sections
comments.resolutions: Yarn has a bug where it does not load resolutions from packages in a workspace, so those need to be hoisted here. See https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/issues/5039.
